powers.title: Compassionate
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you spare a life.

powers.title: Hero
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you risk your life to protect someone.

powers.title: Honest
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your honesty gets you into trouble.

powers.title: Oath
powers.description: You have sworn an oath. Gain 3VT when following it makes your life more complicated.

powers.title: Ambitious
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you make a sacrifice to achieve your life’s ambition.

powers.title: Selfless
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you make personal sacrifice for the good of someone else.

powers.title: Loyal
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your loyalty makes you vulnerable.

powers.title: Idealist
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your devotion to your ideals makes your life more complicated.

powers.title: Curious
powers.description: Gain 3VT when following your curiosity gets you in trouble.

powers.title: Fearless
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you do something your character fears the most.

powers.title: Prudent
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you resist a temptation and forego some short-term benefit for the greater good.

powers.title: Open Minded
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your character learns a valuable lesson that changes them in some significant way.

powers.title: Optimist
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your unreasonably rosy view of the world makes you vulnerable.

powers.title: Generous
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your generosity costs you something of value.

powers.title: Troubled
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time indulging in one of your flaws/impulses/temptations puts you at risk/disadvantage, leads to a setback/complication, costs you something important, makes you act against your best interests, makes you suffer a negative effect for the good of the story. Specify one flaw. Arrogance, Greed, Ignorance, Recklessness, Social Awkwardness, Addiction, Indecisiveness, Short Temper, Biggest Fear, etc.

powers.title: Celebrity
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you become the center of attention in a crowd at a bad moment, when your vanity puts you at a disadvantage.

powers.title: Irreverent
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you challenge authority (like threatening someone too powerful) and it puts you at a disadvantage.

powers.title: Important Relationships
powers.description: Gain 3VT when some important or difficult relationship in your life (to a person or a group) makes your life more complicated.

powers.title: Notorious
powers.description: You are very well known. You’re hated or loved by a group of people. Gain 3VT when this makes life more difficult for you.

powers.title: Eccentric
powers.description: Gain 3VT when your eccentric or quirky behavior puts you into difficult social situations.

powers.title: Troubled Past
powers.description: Gain 3VT when something from your past comes back to haunt you.

powers.title: Gullible
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you put your trust into the wrong person.

powers.title: Evocative
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you  have a really touching, emotional, dramatic scene that makes other players feel and care about your character.

powers.title: Riveting
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time your actions evoke a specific emotion or reaction from the other players. Pick one reaction, for example “Aww!”, Face-palm, Fist-shaking, Shiver of terror, Fist-pump, “Nooo!”, Getting a laugh from the group, etc.

powers.title: Team Player
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you risk or sacrifice something to help another player to accomplish something they want.

powers.title: Peacemaker
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you find a non-combat resolution.

powers.title: Detective
powers.description: Gain 3VT every time you solve a difficult puzzle or figure out a secret.

powers.title: Supportive
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you make another character look awesome, when your actions put them in an epic situation.

powers.title: Inventive
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you find a way to use the environment around you in some creative or unusual way.

powers.title: Poet
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you describe what’s going on in a rhyming verse or a limerick.

powers.title: Drawbacks of the Talent
powers.description: Gain 3VT when one of your Talents results in a shortcoming or creates a complication (Strength - your big muscles might make it difficult to crawl through a narrow space. Intimidation - you might scare the target too much, Investigation - you might find it hard to resist going into danger to look for clues, Animal Handling - you might like a weird monster too much, etc.)

powers.title: High Concept
powers.description: Gain 3VT when you make the story more exciting by acting according to a unique and pithy one-liner that best describes your character concept (Broken Heart, My favorite dish is Revenge, Sucker for a Pretty Face, The Boy Who Lived, Posh Goblin, Price Tag on My Head, Amnesiac, Cop on the Edge, Mama's Boy, Paranoid, Righteous Zeal, Morbid Curiosity, Irresistible Beauty, Looking for True Love, etc.)

powers.title: Custom Trait
powers.description: Make up your own custom trait! How can an aspect of your character present a challenge, create a complication, put you into a difficult situation, or otherwise make the story more interesting and exciting? What roleplaying challenge or exercise would you like to play with?  (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Strength
powers.description: You're as strong as a bodybuilder. Good at lifting and destroying things.

powers.title: Agility
powers.description: You are very flexible and fast, good at jumping, climbing, gymnastics.

powers.title: Toughness
powers.description: Unbendable will and resilient body, you can survive in difficult situations.

powers.title: Perception
powers.description: You have keen senses, allowing you to notice subtle and hidden things.

powers.title: Stealth
powers.description: You are very good at  sneaking, hiding, avoiding unwanted attention.

powers.title: Sleight of Hand
powers.description: You’re good at manual trickery, physical forms of deception:stealing, planting, concealing, smuggling.

powers.title: Melee Combat
powers.description: You have excellent combat skills.

powers.title: Ranged Weapons
powers.description: You are an excellent marksman.

powers.title: Insight
powers.description: You are very good at understanding people, figuring out their intentions, reading social cues.

powers.title: Persuasion
powers.description: You are charming, likable, eloquent, good at convincing people.

powers.title: Deception
powers.description: You are cunning, remarkably good at lying, trickery, pretending.

powers.title: Intimidation
powers.description: You’re good at influencing people through threats and inspiring fear.

powers.title: Seduction
powers.description: You've got good game.

powers.title: Leadership
powers.description: You’re great at inspiring people to follow your vision.

powers.title: Diplomacy
powers.description: You’re great at solving problems through non-violent means.

powers.title: Performance
powers.description: Delight audience with your acting, storytelling, dance, other forms of entertainment.

powers.title: Politics
powers.description: You have good insight into political alliances, motivations, plots.

powers.title: Nature
powers.description: You’re good at avoiding natural hazards and navigating wilderness.

powers.title: Animal Handling
powers.description: You are good at dealing with animals.

powers.title: Medicine
powers.description: You understand medicine, know how to treat wounds and diseases.

powers.title: Arcane Knowledge
powers.description: You have deep understanding of magic and arcane arts.

powers.title: Lore
powers.description: Recall facts about the world.

powers.title: Religion
powers.description: You understand religions and gods of the world.

powers.title: Investigation
powers.description: Find subtle clues, notice details, make deductions.

powers.title: Gather Information
powers.description: Gather information from rumors and interrogation.

powers.title: Research
powers.description: Find information quickly from books and documents.

powers.title: Crafting
powers.description: You’re good at putting together makeshift devices.

powers.title: Forgery
powers.description: Forge items, documents, or art.

powers.title: Lock Picking
powers.description: Pick simple locks.

powers.title: Disguise
powers.description: Conceal your identity with makeup, clothes, and overall appearance.

powers.title: Navigation
powers.description: Find your way in the wilderness. You can avoid natural hazards, find the closest  shelter, oasis, nest of an animal.

powers.title: Tracking
powers.description: You can follow tracks and identify what kind of creature has left them.

powers.title: Vehicles
powers.description: You can drive/pilot any vehicle.

powers.title: Traps
powers.description: You can create, find, disarm traps.

powers.title: Profession
powers.description: You are good at a profession of your choice. You get advantage on all rolls relevant to your area of expertise.

powers.title: Custom Talent
powers.description: Come up with your own talent! What other general talent does your character have? What would benefit them in a range of different situations? (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Magic Trick
powers.description: You can do what David Blaine can do. Any simple magic trick that isn’t actually magical in nature.

powers.title: Boyscout
powers.description: You’re always prepared! Search through your pockets and find any mundane item of your choice.

powers.title: Identify
powers.description: Figure out properties of an object and how to use them. Learn whether the object is affected by spells and what they are.

powers.title: Examine Creature
powers.description: Figure out the creature’s strengths, vulnerabilities, special powers.

powers.title: Musician
powers.description: When you’re playing a musical instrument - roll the dice. If you roll above 10, everybody around you can’t resist dancing.

powers.title: Remedy
powers.description: Scavenge a nearby area and find a plant-based remedy for an ailment. You find enough for a single dose. The remedy cures temporary illness and eliminates poison.

powers.title: Examine Corpse
powers.description: Determine the exact cause and time of it’s death.

powers.title: First Aid
powers.description: If your ally has just passed out, you can awaken them, leaving them with one VT.

powers.title: Gather Intel
powers.description: Infiltrate the person's office or home, and use your skills to reveal one of those things: The identity of an important associate, a location they will travel to (with the time and date), a secret that would embarrass them if revealed, their true feelings about you or your party, who they’re loyal to.

powers.title: Stealthy Spellcasting
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can cast spells in a way that is undetectable by the people around you.

powers.title: Ambush
powers.description: Prepare an ambush. When you attack the target they will be surprised, and everyone in your group can take an action before they react.

powers.title: Conceal Object
powers.description: Conceal an object of your choice, it will be impossible to discover that you have it until you use it.

powers.title: Fake Death
powers.description: Appear to be dead for the next 30 minutes.

powers.title: Darkvision
powers.description: For the next hour you can see in pitch darkness as if it’s an overcast day.

powers.title: Eagle Eye
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you have superhuman vision, you can see the tiniest objects extremely far away.

powers.title: Owl’s Ear
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you have hypersensitive hearing. Hear things that are very far away, hear through walls.

powers.title: Sense Danger
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you will notice all the imminent threats around you.

powers.title: Echolocation
powers.description: When you’re inside a building or a cave you can make a loud noise and interpret the echo, giving you a vague overview of the shape of the location.

powers.title: Spread the Word
powers.description: Spread any rumor. Say a couple of sentences, and they go viral. Not everyone believes them, but everyone is talking about them.

powers.title: Handsome
powers.description: You’re extremely good looking. Spend 1VT to dazzle someone with your beauty.

powers.title: Connections
powers.description: You’re on good terms with a group of people of your choice. They’ll do their best to help you to the best of their ability.

powers.title: Aristocrat
powers.description: Your flawless manners and elegant demeanor make you appear rich and high status.

powers.title: Command
powers.description: Speak a simple two-word command (approach me, drop item, flee, fall down, etc), and a target creature will obey.

powers.title: Act like you belong
powers.description: Invent a local saying and use it in your conversation with the NPC. It allows you to blend in and appear as a member of the social group NPC belongs to, gaining their trust.

powers.title: Tell a Tale
powers.description: Tell a local myth to the NPC, and explain what the lesson of it is ("Give refuge to strangers", "Help others", "Don't lie", "Forgive people", "Be a fair dealer", etc). NPC will comply with reasonable requests that are in line with the lesson.

powers.title: Inspiring Speech
powers.description: Once per day you can bolster the spirits of your party by giving an inspiring speech. When completed, your party recovers 6VT.

powers.title: Folk Song
powers.description: You sing a song that kindles strong feelings in the friendly/neutral NPCs nearby (you need to sing a song at the table). This will influence the mood of the people around you to the one of your choice (happy, somber, proud, indignant, etc.)

powers.title: Frighten Animals
powers.description: Make yourself appear threatening, making all the nearby non-magical creatures run away.

powers.title: Actor
powers.description: You can flawlessly portray any dramatic emotion. Anyone who sees your performance will believe that you’re completely sincere.

powers.title: Suggestion
powers.description: You are extremely convincing. You can suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two), and the target person will purses the course of action you described to the best of its ability. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable.

powers.title: Inspire
powers.description: Give your friend a compliment, and they will have an advantage on the next roll.

powers.title: Gossip
powers.description: Say something bad about a person, and your target will be hostile towards them.

powers.title: Authority
powers.description: When you quickly wave a badge or a  document in front of someone, it will appear to be whatever credentials they expect to see in this situation.

powers.title: Remoralization
powers.description: Give a profound and inspiring speech, making the target person act in alignment with their values. They will stop doing anything they feel guilty for, and will do their best to do the right thing. Lasts a day.

powers.title: Confuse
powers.description: Say or do something so confusing that the person’s thinking will be extremely slow while they’re processing it.

powers.title: Place a Bounty
powers.description: Place a bounty on an ordinary person (not a king or a villain). Offer a valuable item as payment (a cool one or better). Roll the dice. If you roll 10 or - the deed will be done by the end of the game. If you roll below 10 - the target learns about the bounty and places one on your head.

powers.title: Recruit
powers.description: Command a nearby commoner to assist you. They will follow your commands to the best of their ability for the next day.

powers.title: Silver Tongue
powers.description: You’re amazing at flattering people. When compliment someone, they can’t help but to like you.

powers.title: Famous
powers.description: You are well known. When you pick this skill, you can choose what reputation you have in a specific region (Hero, Villain, Philanthropist, Sex Symbol, etc.)

powers.title: Grapple
powers.description: You grapple the opponent of your size or smaller. You can hold them for up to 5 minutes.

powers.title: Resilient
powers.description: For the next hour you can’t get tired from physical exertion.

powers.title: Sprinter
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can run as fast as a horse.

powers.title: Leap
powers.description: Jump up to 10 times the normal distance.

powers.title: Ricochet
powers.description: Shoot around the corners by bouncing arrows or thrown weapons off the walls.

powers.title: Battle Stomp
powers.description: Smash your weapon into the ground, knock down everyone around you.

powers.title: Provoke
powers.description: Attract the attention of all the enemies. They will attack you instead of your friends until the battle is over or they take damage from someone else.

powers.title: Parry
powers.description: Parry a physical attack against you.

powers.title: Deadeye
powers.description: Allows you to make an extremely precise shot at the tiny objects extremely far away.

powers.title: Smash
powers.description: Destroy any object up to the size of a barrel in one hit (if it’s not being held by someone).

powers.title: Deflect
powers.description: Use your melee weapon to deflect any attack (including magical ones) back to it’s target. Roll the dice. If you roll above 10 you succeed, otherwise it’s just dodged.

powers.title: Throw Anything
powers.description: You can use any creature or an object you can lift as a thrown weapon. You can also throw them carefully, in a way that doesn’t deal damage.

powers.title: Martial Arts Master
powers.description: You can do anything Jackie Chan can do. You are a true ninja. Run on water, run on walls, instantly master any combat tactic you see. You no longer suffer falling damage.

powers.title: Pet Pal
powers.description: You can speak with animals.

powers.title: Animal Buddy
powers.description: Recruit a nearby animal, they will follow your orders to the best of their ability. It can't be smaller than a mouse or bigger than a horse. You can have only one animal partner at a time. If you get separated, it will try to find you. They have 6 HP and can make basic attacks for 2 damage. If the animal is hostile towards you - it won’t follow your orders, but you can calm it down.

powers.title: Distress Signal
powers.description: When in the wilderness, you can build a distress signal that can be seen by Rangers. Within the next day, you will meet an NPC Ranger who comes to your aid.

powers.title: Custom Skill
powers.description: Come up with your custom skill! Think of them as non-magical spells, what kind of specific thing do you want your character to be able to do?  (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Illusion
powers.description: Create an illusory object no larger than a horse, complete with sounds, smells, movement. Within 50 meters, in your line of sight.

powers.title: Darkness
powers.description: Create a field of magical darkness 10 meters in diameter.

powers.title: Disguise Self
powers.description: You create an illusion around yourself - an appearance of any person you’ve seen. Lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: Secret Message
powers.description: Write a message visible only to the people you choose.

powers.title: Invisibility
powers.description: Turn yourself, a willing creature, or an object (no larger than a horse) invisible for the next 20 minutes.

powers.title: Phantasmal Force
powers.description: Target a single person or a creature, create an incredibly realistic illusion including sound, temperature, and other stimuli. The target will treat it as if it was real, and can even take damage from it.

powers.title: Impair Senses
powers.description: Blind or deafen your target for  the next hour.

powers.title: Change Text
powers.description: Change any written text to the text of your choice.

powers.title: Magic Voice
powers.description: Produces a sound of your choice or a voice delivering a message (no longer than 25 words, delivered over as long as 10 minutes). Cast this spell on an object, and describe the circumstances under which the spell will trigger. The trigger should be something visual or audible that occurs within 10 meters around the object. You can choose for the spell to end once it delivers the message, or repeat every time the trigger occurs. For example, you could instruct the voice to speak when any creature moves within 10 meters of the object or when a silver bell rings within 10 meters of it.

powers.title: Veil
powers.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When anything touches the illusion, it is despelled.

powers.title: Message
powers.description: Telepathically send a message to the nearby creature, they can respond back.

powers.title: Charm Person
powers.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

powers.title: Produce Emotion
powers.description: Make the target feel happy, sad, angry, smitten, afraid, insecure, etc.

powers.title: Technomancy
powers.description: Control mechanical and electrical devices with your mind.

powers.title: Telekinesis
powers.description: Levitate small objects, no larger or heavier than a bucket of water.

powers.title: Mold Earth
powers.description: You can target an area (5x5 meter cube) of loose earth, you can instantaneously excavate it, move it along the ground, and deposit it up to 5 meters away.

powers.title: Walk on Walls/Ceiling
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

powers.title: Ascend
powers.description: Propel the target object or creature (including yourself) directly upwards (up to 20 meters).

powers.title: Feather Fall
powers.description: Slows down your fall to the speed of a falling feather.

powers.title: Catapult
powers.description: Propel a small object you can see in the direction of your choice with the force of a thrown rock.

powers.title: Expelliarmus
powers.description: Causes whatever the opponent is holding to fly out of their hands.

powers.title: Bend Space
powers.description: Alter direction of projectiles and small flying objects, change their course up to 90 degrees in any direction.

powers.title: Levitate
powers.description: Slowly lifts the target vertically above the ground, up to 15 meters. The target can weight up to 300 kg.

powers.title: Push/Pull Metal
powers.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move.

powers.title: Change Momentum
powers.description: Halt, decrease, increase, or reverse the momentum of a moving object.

powers.title: Accio
powers.description: Summon any object within 300 meters towards you. You don’t need to know it’s location, but you need to be able to picture it in your mind.

powers.title: Summon Familiar
powers.description: Summon a small creature who will be your pet and a friend. You can communicate with it telepathically, give it commands, see through its eyes, hear what it hears, cast spells through it. If the creature takes damage it disappears until you resummon it. Works once per day.

powers.title: Transfiguration
powers.description: Turn an object into any mundane object of the same size made out of the same material.

powers.title: Intwine
powers.description: Use nearby grass, vines, and tree branches as if they were your own limbs.

powers.title: Annoying Cloud
powers.description: Summon a cloud that will float above the target's head, rain on them, distracting them and impairing their vision for the next hour.

powers.title: Awaken Item
powers.description: Bestow the gift of sentience and speech on an item. It has the personality of your choice.

powers.title: Unseen Servant
powers.description: Create an invisible, stupid, slow creature that can perform simple tasks and follow your orders. Lasts for 1 hour.

powers.title: Grease
powers.description: Cover an object or a surface in grease, making it frictionless.

powers.title: Firehose
powers.description: A stream of water pours out of your hand as if it's a firehose. Lasts 10 minutes.

powers.title: Familiar Transposition
powers.description: Swap places with your familiar.

powers.title: Summon Item
powers.description: Mark an object or an item (no larger than 2x2 meters). Whenever you cast this spell, it will teleport to your hand (or in front of you) from wherever it is.

powers.title: Summon Creature
powers.description: Summon a non-magical animal no larger than a cow. It obeys your commands. Disappears within an hour.

powers.title: Recall
powers.description: After you cast the spell in a location, you and your group can teleport back to it once.

powers.title: Misty Step
powers.description: Instantly teleport a short-distance (a stone's throw, line of sight. Think Nightcrawler from X-Men).

powers.title: Small Fireball
powers.description: Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source.

powers.title: Freeze Pulse
powers.description: Freezes liquids, covers objects with ice, creates ice on the ground (can do what Frozone from Incredibles can do).

powers.title: Wall of Ice
powers.description: Create an ice wall, 10x10 meters. Window is optional.

powers.title: Jet of Wind
powers.description: Create a jet of wind powerful enough to knock people off their feet.

powers.title: Skywrite
powers.description: Cause up to 10 words to form in the sky you can see (made of clouds).

powers.title: Daylight
powers.description: During the night, you can make it bright as day in an area the size of a village.

powers.title: Plane of Force
powers.description: Create 30x30 meters invisible wall of force (at any angle). Lasts for 30 minutes or until it takes 10 damage. Can support up to 500kg of weight.

powers.title: Lightning Bolt
powers.description: A bolt of lightning strikes it from the sky or from your hands, dealing damage, melting metallic objects, and stunning the target creature for 1 minute. It's unable to move or do anything.

powers.title: Fire Weapon
powers.description: Casting this on a melee weapon or an arrow will wreathe it in flame, giving you advantage on attacks for the next 30 minutes. Things touched by the weapon are set on fire.

powers.title: Alarm
powers.description: Set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or a 10x10 meter. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever anyone enters the warded area.

powers.title: Shroud of Silence
powers.description: No sound can be created within or pass through a 10-meter-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice. Lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: Protect
powers.description: Make an object invulnerable to damage for the next day. Make a window, door, or an object (like a chest) impossible to open. You know the password that unlocks it.

powers.title: Dispel Magic
powers.description: Dispels magical effects and or enchantments on a target.

powers.title: Trigger
powers.description: Pick one of the spells you know that will activate when a certain condition is met. Whenever that happens within the designated area(15-meter-radius) the spell will be cast.

powers.title: Velocity Ward
powers.description: Nothing can move faster than a falling feather within a sphere of 15 meter radius for the next 15 minutes .

powers.title: Counterspell
powers.description: Interrupt a spell being cast by another mage.

powers.title: Life Transfer
powers.description: Gift your VT to the target person or creature. For every 4VT you spend they gain 3VT.

powers.title: Tiny Hut
powers.description: An immobile force field 10 meters in diameter springs up around you. It’s impenetrable from the outside but not from the inside. The spell ends when you leave the area.

powers.title: Enlarge/Reduce
powers.description: Make the object or a creature grow or shrink to 4 times it’s size.

powers.title: Sharpen
powers.description: Makes your weapon infinitely sharp and able to cut through anything for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Change Luck
powers.description: Once per session you can replace a 20 roll with a 1 or vice versa.

powers.title: Join
powers.description: You create a line of sticky silk, joining two distant objects or surfaces together. The thread is strong enough to handle a weight of an elephant.

powers.title: Glue
powers.description: Instantly glues 2 objects to each other. Lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: Elasticity
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can do what Elastigirl from Incredibles can do.

powers.title: Transfiguration
powers.description: Turn an object into any mundane object of the same size made out of the same material.

powers.title: Reverse Gravity
powers.description: Reverse gravity inside 10x10 meter cube in your line of sight.

powers.title: Quicksand
powers.description: Turn into quicksand a 10x10 meters piece of ground in front of you.

powers.title: Turn into Creature
powers.description: Touch a willing non-magical creature  to “acquire” it’s form. Now you can turn into this creature for up to an hour.

powers.title: Petrify
powers.description: Turns a non-magical creature or an object (no larger than a barrel) you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

powers.title: Cat Form
powers.description: For the next hour you turn into a cat.

powers.title: Phasing
powers.description: Become immaterial (like a ghost) for the next 5 secnods. Walk through doors, let attacks pass through you.

powers.title: Sail the Wind
powers.description: Turn into a cloud of fog. You can slowly drift in any direction of your choice. Lasts an hour.

powers.title: Locate Object
powers.description: Describe an object that is familiar to you. You can sense  the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 300 meters of you.

powers.title: Sense Magic
powers.description: You can sense the magic auras of any spells, items, or creatures within 200 meters around you. You'll get a vague sense of what they are, and their general direction.

powers.title: Glance
powers.description: You can peer into the recent past. Ask about specific event that happened in your location in the past day, and get a small piece of information about that event.

powers.title: Oracle
powers.description: You can ask the gods one question and receive an honest Yes or No answer. The GM will say yes, no, or shrug if it's impossible to answer.

powers.title: Raise a Zombie
powers.description: Raises a zombie.

powers.title: Vampirism
powers.description: Recover 5VT by drinking the blood of a sentient creature you've just killed. If you have this spell, you can't walk into houses uninvited, and you lose 1VT for every hour you are under direct sunlight.

powers.title: Custom Spell
powers.description: Come up with your own spell! (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: Friendship Bracelets
powers.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Enables you to talk telepathically to anybody who has one (within 300 meters).

powers.title: Immovable rod
powers.description: Activating it makes it magically fixed in place. Until someone deactivates it, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

powers.title: Darkvision goggles
powers.description: See in the darkness as if it was daylight.

powers.title: Ultimate Lockpick
powers.description: When you insert it into any lock, it morphs into the key that fits.

powers.title: Infrared goggles
powers.description: Add infrared vision that lets you see an outline of things that are generating heat nearby. Work through walls.

powers.title: Portable Hole
powers.description: A round black piece of fine silk, 5 meters in diameter. When unfolded creates a 5-meter-deep hole. Regardless of contents it weighs nothing.

powers.title: All or nothing coin
powers.description: Once per day instead of rolling a die you flip a coin. Heads critical success, tails critical failure.

powers.title: The Scope of Fears
powers.description: Looking through this glass at a creature will tell you what the creature fears most, but will also tell the creature your greatest fear.

powers.title: Horseshoe of Attraction
powers.description: Turns into a powerful magnet when activated. Can swith polarity and repel objects instead. Can be activated telepathically, from a distance of up to 50 meters.

powers.title: Ring of Crawlies
powers.description: Allows you to control any single insect within your line of sight.

powers.title: Mini Lighthouse
powers.description: Creates a small beam of light that can be seen for miles.

powers.title: Bottomless Mug
powers.description: Can hold a swimming-pool-worth of any liquid.

powers.title: Howler
powers.description: A magical letter, will scream it’s contents once delivered.

powers.title: Alarm Pebble
powers.description: A small rock, will alert the holder when anything comes within 15 meters of it.

powers.title: Spring Shoes
powers.description: Allow you to jump 10 times normal distance.

powers.title: Grappling Hook Gun
powers.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters, reels it back in.

powers.title: Spyglass
powers.description: Helps you see farther.

powers.title: Bear Trap
powers.description: Perfect for setting traps.

powers.title: Artist’s Tools
powers.description: A set of tools of your choice - a musical instrument, paint brushes, sculpting clay, cooking supplies, etc.

powers.title: Trampoline
powers.description: Things that fall on it bounce back up.

powers.title: Daily Cypress
powers.description: A magic newspaper. Always shows you the most recent news headlines.

powers.title: Anyrobe
powers.description: A robe that transforms into any set of clothes of your choice.

powers.title: Swap Cube
powers.description: You can swap the cube with an object no larger or heavier than a barrel within clear line of sight (can't be used on objects that are being worn/used/held by someone.)

powers.title: Spy's Monocle
powers.description: When pressed against the surface (like a wall or a door, no thicker than 30cm) turns into a hole you can see through. The hole can't be seen from the other side.

powers.title: Illusory Minion
powers.description: A small pearl that turns into an illusory person or a creature when it's activated. The illusion can perform simple tasks you give it. It lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

powers.title: Magic Dampener
powers.description: An amulet that sucks out all the magic within 15 meter radius when activated. No spells or enchantments will work within this area. Can only be used once, lasts 1 hour.

powers.title: The Stopwatch of Timelessness
powers.description: Makes time run 10x slower within a sphere of 15-meter radius. Works once per day, lasts 1 minute.

powers.title: Fairy Dust
powers.description: Allows you to imbue an item with one of the spells you know. The item will be able to cast the spell once per day. Consumable, can be used only once.

powers.title: Refilling Flask
powers.description: Refills itself every midnight with whatever non-magical liquid was last in it.

powers.title: Clay Golem
powers.description: Slow and stupid servant, capable of obeying simple commands.

powers.title: Unlabelled package
powers.description: Mysterious package. When you unwrap it, you can declare what was contained inside. It can be anything, as long as it's no more valuable than a horse or a good sword. If you name something too valuable/powerful, the box returns the closest thing that fits into the value range (if you ask for a potion of immortality, it might return a health potion or a spell scroll).

powers.title: Ring of Spell Storing
powers.description: Cast a spell on the ring to store it. Anyone who wears the ring can now cast this spell once. Stores up to 3 spells.

powers.title: Ring of Tracking
powers.description: The owner of the ring always knows it’s location.

powers.title: Silver Fly
powers.description: Send it anywhere within 30 meters from you, see and hear through it's senses.

powers.title: Ropey
powers.description: A sentient piece of rope. 50ft. As smart as a puppy. Obeys simple commands (coil, uncoil, tie a knot, crawl).

powers.title: Ring of Sending
powers.description: Send a telepathic 25-word message to anyone you have ever met.The recipient can send you a 25-word reply. Works twice per day.

powers.title: Small Vitality Crystal
powers.description: Automatically accumulates energy. Use it once per day to recover 4VT.

powers.title: Book of Oath
powers.description: A vow written in this book can’t be broken.

powers.title: Portable Direwolf
powers.description: A small wooden figure of a direwolf. When activated, turns into the actual animal.

powers.title: Magic Tent
powers.description: Looks like a spacious and comfy house once you get in.

powers.title: Orb of Illusion
powers.description: Records the environment around it, when placed on the ground plays back the illusion of the recording (like a hologram).

powers.title: Snake Tube
powers.description: Conjures one snake per day.

powers.title: Handy Handbag
powers.description: Sprouts tentacles and follows it’s owner when they’re not looking.

powers.title: Resizable Crate
powers.description: Big wooden crate, when activated it shrinks itself and it’s contents down to the size of a coin. Can fit up to 2 people.

powers.title: Pokeball
powers.description: Stores a friendly or defeated animal.

powers.title: Jacket of Useful Things
powers.description: Can produce any small cheap mundane item from it’s pockets.

powers.title: Bag of Gold
powers.description: Can be used to live a lavish lifestyle for a month, or traded for something valuable.

powers.title: Conman’s Paper
powers.description: A sheet of paper that can be transformed to look like any official document. Transformation is permanent, can't be used more than once.

powers.title: Holocrystal
powers.description: Magic-powered smartphone.

powers.title: Magic Orb
powers.description: Allows you to see and hear the target person or a creature, and their surroundings. Works 10 minutes per day, requires a lock of the person's hair to attune to them.

powers.title: Telepathy Lockets
powers.description: Two lockets, when people wear them they share a telepathic link, sharing all thoughts and sensations.

powers.title: Mirror of Merlin
powers.description: When it is hit by a spell it soaks in its power. When activated, it casts the spell it's been hit with.

powers.title: An orb of Disaster
powers.description: A small glass orb, when shattered will summon a natural disaster - a storm, a hurricane, or a blizzard.

powers.title: A Unicorn Bone
powers.description: When consumed, will teleport you up to 60 seconds into the past, enabling you to replay what just happened differently.

powers.title: Marauder's Map
powers.description: When activated, reveals the floor plan of the area you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside. Can be used once, lasts for an hour, then turns into an ordinary map of the place where it's been activated.

powers.title: Emerald bug
powers.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it. Can be used once.

powers.title: Neuralizer
powers.description: In a flash, wipes the last hour of memories for everyone looking at it. Can be used once.

powers.title: Creature Blueprints
powers.description: Allows you to craft an artifical creature like a robot or a golem. It takes you a month to build one.

powers.title: Otherworldly Item
powers.description: A small token that turns into any item from our world that you choose (no larger than a bike, no deadlier than a revolver, no more expensive than a horse).

powers.title: Vitality Potion
powers.description: Restores 6 VT.

powers.title: Smoke Potion
powers.description: Creates a huge cloud of black smoke when spilled.

powers.title: Catnip
powers.description: When spilled attracts all the cats within 100km radius.

powers.title: Invisibility Potion
powers.description: Turns you invisible for 10 minutes.

powers.title: Anti-Gravity Potion
powers.description: Drinker isn't affected by gravity for an hour.

powers.title: Falcon Potion
powers.description: Turns you into a falcon for 30 minutes.

powers.title: Flask of Oil
powers.description: Make things slippery. You can set it on fire.

powers.title: Vial of Acid
powers.description: Burns through objects.

powers.title: Chloroform
powers.description: The one who inhales it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour

powers.title: Strength Potion
powers.description: Allows you to summon a superhuman strength and auto-succeed on any strength-roll in the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Fear Potion
powers.description: Anyone who inhales it feels horrified for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Shrinking Potion
powers.description: The drinker shrinks to be 20 times smaller for 20 minutes.

powers.title: Potion of Body Switching
powers.description: When two people drink this potion, it swaps their minds freaky-friday style for 2 hours.

powers.title: Tea of Shared Dreams
powers.description: When multiple people drink it and go to sleep, they will find themselves in a shared dream.

powers.title: Polyjuice Potion
powers.description: Drop someone’s hair into it, and drinking this potion will turn you into that person or (non-magical) creature for 30 minutes.

powers.title: Potion of Greater Telekinesis
powers.description: Enables you to levitate objects and creatures (not including yourself, no larger than an elephant). Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object. Effect lasts an hour.

powers.title: Truth Serum
powers.description: One who drinks it can’t tell lies for an hour.

powers.title: Potion of Dream Sharing
powers.description: Puts you into deep sleep, enabling you to reach into the target persons's dreams.

powers.title: A Potion of Telepathy
powers.description: For the next 10 minutes you can hear and understand what a target creature within 50 meters is thinking. Alternatively, you can target an unconscious creature, and pull out any 15 minutes of their memories.

powers.title: Potion of a Spider King
powers.description: Enables you to sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius for the next hour.

powers.title: Twin Potion
powers.description: Drinking it splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your vitality points. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies. Lasts an hour.

powers.title: Potion of Many Eyes
powers.description: Drinking it enables you to see through the eyes of all living creatures in 150 meter radius around you for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Spirit Potion
powers.description: Pour it onto a dead person or a creature to summon their ghost. You can communicate with them for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Flying Potion
powers.description: Grantsthe power of flight. The target can fly at a speed of a bird for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Melee Weapon
powers.description: A simple melee weapon of your choice (Sword, Dagger, Axe, Whip, etc.)

powers.title: Ranged Weapon
powers.description: A simple ranged weapon of your choice (Bow, Crossbow, Throwing Dagger, Spear, Dart, etc.)

powers.title: Staff of Druid
powers.description: Strike earth, and a fountain of water will shoot up from that location for the next 10 minutes.

powers.title: Bullseye Dart
powers.description: Can hit any target within 50 meters with infinite precision. Deals 4 damage.

powers.title: Needler
powers.description: A throwing dagger that returns back into your hand once it hits or misses the target. Stays hidden when the wielder is searched.

powers.title: Loyal Boomerang
powers.description: After saying the command word the boomerang returns to your hand (from anywhere in the world).

powers.title: Anysword
powers.description: An empty hilt. When activated, instantly morphs into any melee weapon of your choice.

powers.title: Grenade
powers.description: Deals damage to everyone around it.

powers.title: Scroll of Teleportation
powers.description: Allows you to teleport anywhere within 100 meters once.

powers.title: Chalk of Doors
powers.description: Draw a door on a solid surface, it will open to the last door you’ve stepped through.

powers.title: Hoverboard
powers.description: Floats 30cm above the ground, frictionless, supports any weight.

powers.title: Wingsuit
powers.description: Allows you to glide through the air.

powers.title: Portkey
powers.description: When activated, teleports anyone who touches it to the location of your choice. Can be used once.

powers.title: Steed
powers.description: A horse or a horse-like creature you can ride.

powers.title: Wagon
powers.description: Store currently unused items in it. Stash them in a wagon or put them back in your inventory when you have an hour to rest.

powers.title: Twin Portals
powers.description: Two hula hoop sized obsidian rings, when activated they are connected by a wormhole that works like portals from the game “Portal”. The connection lasts 10 minutes, can be used only once.

powers.title: Teleportation pyramids
powers.description: Two small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid. Can be used once per day.

powers.title: Spellbook
powers.description: Allows you to learn one spell.

powers.title: Skillbook
powers.description: Allows you to learn one skill.

powers.title: Spellscroll
powers.description: Allows to cast a specific spell once.

powers.title: Resurrection Scroll
powers.description: Allows you to resurrect a dead person.

powers.title: Custom Item
powers.description: Come up with your own item! (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

powers.title: In Character
powers.description: You get advantage a roll when you’re acting according to one trait of your choice (choose one of the traits you already have). When using this talent to gain advantage, you don’t gain the 3VT that using a Trait usually gives you, instead you just spend 1VT on using this talent.

powers.title: Live on the Edge
powers.description: You gain advantage on all rolls when you have 4VT or less.

powers.title: Brew Poison
powers.description: You can brew poison from common ingredients.

powers.title: Craft an Item
powers.description: Once per day you can craft a simple mundane item.

powers.title: Craft Anything
powers.description: Once per month you can invent and craft a fantasy equivalent of any item from our world.

powers.title: Sense Motive
powers.description: You can read social cues so well that you can determine whether someone is lying to you, whether something odd is going on, or to assess someone’s trustworthiness.

powers.title: Find an Intern
powers.description: You find an aspiring adventurer looking to gain some experience.  They will follow you around and do their best to obey your orders and provide assistance.

powers.title: Value Change
powers.description: Give a life-changing speech. Alters one of the person’s fundamental values, can turn an evil person good or flip an enemy to your side.

powers.title: Forensics
powers.description: You can use do whatever a modern forensics lab can do.

powers.title: Quick Learner
powers.description: You can learn any complicated task just by watching someone do it. You’ll be able to perform it for the next day.

powers.title: Misty Step
powers.description: Instantly teleport a short-distance (a stone's throw, line of sight. Think Nightcrawler from X-Men).

powers.title: Split
powers.description: Splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your vitality points. Sustaining a clone takes 2 VT per hour. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies.

powers.title: Greater Teleportation
powers.description: Teleport any object a creature to any point within 100 meters.

powers.title: Open Portal
powers.description: Open two connected portals within your line of sight. Works like portal gun from “Portal”.

powers.title: Conjure a Fortress
powers.description: Create a mighty fortress. It has turrets that deal 8 damage.

powers.title: Greater Telekinesis
powers.description: Levitate human-sized objects and creatures (not including yourself). Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object.

powers.title: Veil
powers.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When a creature touches the illusion they can no longer see it.

powers.title: Auto Illusion
powers.description: Create an illusory person or a creature that can perform simple tasks you give it. It lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

powers.title: Anti-magic Ward
powers.description: Magic doesn’t work within a sphere of 15 meter radius.

powers.title: Slow Time
powers.description: Makes time run 10x slower within a sphere of 15-meter radius.

powers.title: Animate Objects
powers.description: Objects come to life and obey your commands.

powers.title: Speed
powers.description: For the next 2 seconds the time flows 100 times slower for you, so it feels to you like 3 minutes (Quicksilver powers).

powers.title: Turn into Monster
powers.description: You can turn into a monster or a magical creature of your choice.

powers.title: Greater Polymorph
powers.description: You can turn the target (a person or an object) into any creature for an hour.

powers.title: Time Stop
powers.description: You stop the time for everyone but yourself. The spell ends if you interact with any creature or an object they’re wearing or carrying.

powers.title: Second Chance
powers.description: Teleport up to 60 seconds into the past, and replay what just happened differently.

powers.title: Greater Transfiguration
powers.description: Turn any creature into a different creature or an object and vice versa. Lasts an hour.

powers.title: Fidelius Charm
powers.description: Perfectly conceal one location of your choice. It becomes invisible, intangible, undetectable by anyone unless the secret of it’s location is shared with them.

powers.title: Scry
powers.description: See and hear the target person or a creature, and their surroundings.

powers.title: Invade Dreams
powers.description: You can reach into people’s dreams. Taking damage in a dream deals it in real life.

powers.title: Telepathy
powers.description: Create a telepathic link with any willing creature. You can share any thoughts and sensations.

powers.title: Command Monster
powers.description: Give the creature or a monster a command it must obey.

powers.title: Read Memories
powers.description: Search through the unconscious creature's mind, pulling out 15 minutes of memories.

powers.title: Erase Memory
powers.description: Erase 15 minutes of memory of an unconscious creature.

powers.title: Control Bugs
powers.description: You can sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius for the next hour.

powers.title: Implant Memory
powers.description: Implant a false memory into an unconscious creature (the memory can be at most 15 minutes long).

powers.title: Imitate Spell
powers.description: You can cast the last spell you have seen someone else cast.

powers.title: Bestow Spell
powers.description: Give the target an ability to use one of the spells you know once.

powers.title: Bestow Sentience
powers.description: Touch a non-sentient creature, and bestow the gift of sentience and intelligence onto it.

powers.title: Natural Disaster
powers.description: Summon a natural disaster - a storm, a hurricane, or a blizzard.

powers.title: Teleportation pyramids
powers.description: 2 small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid.

powers.title: Flying Broom
powers.description: Soar through the air.

powers.title: Coconuts of the Monty
powers.description: Two halves of a coconut, that when clapped together cause the user and up to 10 others to travel at the pace of a horse.

powers.title: Teleportation Key
powers.description: Teleports you and up to 5 people who are touching it to any location you have ever personally visited. 1 hour cooldown.

powers.title: Dimensional Gate
powers.description: A pair of portals (large obsidian circles) connected by a wormhole.

powers.title: Flying Vehicle
powers.description: Your own zeppelin or an airship!

powers.title: Crown of Eyes
powers.description: Activate it to see through the eyes of all living creatures in 150 meter radius around you for up to 10 minutes. 5VP to activate.

powers.title: Meeseeks Box
powers.description: Press a button, name a simple task, it will create a helpful servant. The Meeseek lives until he accomplishes the simple task (up to an hour). If the task proves to be too difficult, he may turn on you out of frustration. 6VT to activate.

powers.title: Marauder's Map
powers.description: Reveals the floor plan of the area you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside.

powers.title: Wizard’s Tower
powers.description: Once per week you can teleport it to a new location.

powers.title: Emerald bug
powers.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it.

powers.title: Sable
powers.description: Black glove, touch any object or creature to store it inside the glove. Can store unlimited amount of objects. Living creatures can get out when they wish.

powers.title: Neuralizer
powers.description: In a flash, wipes the last hour of memories for everyone looking at it.

powers.title: Large Vitality Crystal
powers.description: Automatically accumulates energy. Use it once per day to recover 8VT.

powers.title: Magic Lamp
powers.description: Summons a Djinn who will perform any Spell or Skill of your choice. May grant other kinds of wishes (at the discretion of the GM). Can be used 3 times.

powers.title: Eye of Vance
powers.description: Sees everything in 360 degrees and 100m radius around you. Can see through solid objects. Can see invisible objects. Can see anything hidden. Works twice per day for 10 minutes.

powers.title: Invisibility Cloak
powers.description: Turns the wearer invisible.

powers.title: Imperius Collar
powers.description: When it's put onto a person or a creature, you gain the ability to mind-control them and see through their senses. 5VT per day to maintain mind control.

powers.title: Wand of Transfiguration
powers.description: Once per day can transfigure any person into an animal.

powers.title: Rememberball
powers.description: Activate it to "Save Game". You can return to the saved state for the next 10 minutes. To "load game" more than once, spend extra 2VT.

powers.title: Jack’s Compass
powers.description: Points to the physical object you desire the most in life.

powers.title: Horcrux
powers.description: Stores a fragment of your soul in an item. After you die, you resurrect at the location of your horcrux.

powers.title: Rook of Building
powers.description: A small chess piece. When activated, it turns into any building or structure you describe (no larger than a tavern).

powers.title: Pet Monster
powers.description: Pet creature of your choice (Big Foot, Dinosaur, Wyvern, Griffin, Bear, etc.)

powers.title: Time Chamber
powers.description: Inside this room, the time moves 30 times faster. Live a month in this room - only a day will pass outside.

powers.title: Wand
powers.description: Make all spells 1VT cheaper.

powers.title: Creature Blueprints
powers.description: Allows you to craft an artifical creature like a robot or a golem. It takes you a month to build one.

powers.title: Vambrace of Octopus
powers.description: Shoots out up to 8 thin, 10 meters long tentacles. Tentacles can grapple things and creatures, or deal 6 damage. Tentacles are strong enough to grasp a ledge of a building, and support your weight hanging on them.

powers.title: Commune with the Dead
powers.description: Touch a dead person or a creature to summon their ghost. You can communicate with them for the next 10 minutes.
